content: crochet a warm hooded scarf using simple stitches and easy repeat row the winter s coming hooded scarf combines a classic granny stitch with a soft ribbed edging and the hood gives extra warmth for cold weather you can adjust the length or width using the stitch repeat **finished size** **scarf ** approx 62 inches long × 9 5 inches wide **hood ** approx 13 × 13 inches **yarn** medium weight yarn caron cakes shown **hook** 5 mm h > this pattern is available for free on > my website which is monetized by ads > if you prefer an ad-free version of > the pattern it is available to > purchase from my pattern shop ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2025 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
